trans-unit.source: Gets all exports that match the conditions of the specified import definition.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene tutte le esportazioni che corrispondono alle condizioni della definizione di importazione specificata.

trans-unit.source: The object that defines the conditions of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref> objects to get.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto che definisce le condizioni del <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"> </xref> oggetti da ottenere.

trans-unit.source: A collection of all the objects matching the condition specified by definition.
trans-unit.target: Una raccolta di tutti i gli oggetti che soddisfano la condizione specificata dal definition .

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition.Cardinality*> is <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportCardinality"></xref> and there are zero <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref> objects that match the conditions of the specified <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition"></xref>. -or- <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition.Cardinality*> is <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportCardinality"></xref> or <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportCardinality"></xref> and there is more than one <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref> object that matches the conditions of the specified <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <>*> Ã¨ <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportCardinality"> </xref> e ci sono zero <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"> </xref> gli oggetti che soddisfano le condizioni dell'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition"> </xref>. - oppure - <> </> *> Ã¨ <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportCardinality"> </xref> o <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportCardinality"> </xref> ed Ã¨ presente piÃ¹ di un <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"> </xref> oggetto che corrisponde alle condizioni dell'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets all exports that match the conditions of the specified import definition and composition.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene tutte le esportazioni che corrispondono alle condizioni della definizione di importazione specificato e composizione.

trans-unit.source: The object that defines the conditions of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref> objects to get.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto che definisce le condizioni del <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"> </xref> oggetti da ottenere.

trans-unit.source: The transactional container for the composition.
trans-unit.target: Il contenitore transazionale per la composizione.

trans-unit.source: A collection of all the objects matching the condition specified by definition and atomicComposition.
trans-unit.target: Una raccolta di tutti i gli oggetti che soddisfano la condizione specificata dal definition e atomicComposition .

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition.Cardinality*> is <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportCardinality"></xref> and there are zero <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref> objects that match the conditions of the specified <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition"></xref>. -or- <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition.Cardinality*> is <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportCardinality"></xref> or <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportCardinality"></xref> and there is more than one <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref> object that matches the conditions of the specified <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <>*> Ã¨ <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportCardinality"> </xref> e ci sono zero <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"> </xref> gli oggetti che soddisfano le condizioni dell'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition"> </xref>. - oppure - <> </> *> Ã¨ <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportCardinality"> </xref> o <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportCardinality"> </xref> ed Ã¨ presente piÃ¹ di un <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"> </xref> oggetto che corrisponde alle condizioni dell'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: -or- atomicComposition is .
trans-unit.target: -or- atomicComposition is .

trans-unit.source: Gets all the exports with the specified contract name.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene tutte le esportazioni con il nome di contratto specificato.

trans-unit.source: The default contract name is the result of calling the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.AttributedModelServices.GetContractName%2A> method on `type`.
trans-unit.target: Il nome di contratto predefinito Ã¨ il risultato della chiamata di <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.AttributedModelServices.GetContractName%2A>metodo `type`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.AttributedModelServices.GetContractName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The contract name is compared by using the <xref:System.StringComparer.Ordinal%2A> property to perform a case-sensitive, non-linguistic comparison.
trans-unit.target: Il nome del contratto viene confrontato con il <xref:System.StringComparer.Ordinal%2A>proprietÃ per eseguire un confronto non linguistico, distinzione maiuscole/minuscole.</xref:System.StringComparer.Ordinal%2A>

trans-unit.source: The type parameter of the <xref:System.Lazy%602> objects to return.
trans-unit.target: Il parametro di tipo di <xref:System.Lazy%602> oggetti da restituire.

trans-unit.source: The type of the metadata view of the <xref:System.Lazy%602> objects to return.
trans-unit.target: Il tipo di visualizzazione dei metadati del <xref:System.Lazy%602> oggetti da restituire.

trans-unit.source: The contract name of the <xref:System.Lazy%602> object to return, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> or an empty string ("") to use the default contract name.
trans-unit.target: Il nome del contratto di <xref:System.Lazy%602> oggetto da restituire, o <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> o una stringa vuota ("") per utilizzare il nome di contratto predefinito.

trans-unit.source: A collection of all the <xref:System.Lazy%602> objects for the contract matching contractName.
trans-unit.target: Una raccolta di tutti i <xref:System.Lazy%602> oggetti per la corrispondenza del contratto contractName .

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer"></xref> object has been disposed of.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer"> </xref> oggetto Ã¨ stato eliminato.

trans-unit.target: typeis .

trans-unit.target: metadataViewTypenon Ã¨ un tipo di visualizzazione di metadati valido.

trans-unit.source: Gets all the exports that match the constraint defined by the specified definition.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene tutte le esportazioni che corrispondono al vincolo definito per la definizione specificata.

trans-unit.source: Overrides of this method should not treat cardinality-related mismatches as errors, and should not throw exceptions in those cases.
trans-unit.target: Esegue l'override di questo metodo non devono considerare le mancate corrispondenze correlate alla cardinalitÃ come errori e non devono generare eccezioni in tali casi.

trans-unit.source: For example, if <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition.Cardinality%2A> is <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportCardinality> and there are zero <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export> objects that match the conditions of the specified <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition>, an empty <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> collection should be returned.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, se <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition.Cardinality%2A>Ã¨ <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportCardinality>e ci sono zero <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export>gli oggetti che soddisfano le condizioni dell'oggetto specificato <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition>, vuota <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>raccolta deve essere restituita.</xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportCardinality> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition.Cardinality%2A>

trans-unit.source: The object that defines the conditions of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref> objects to return.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto che definisce le condizioni del <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"> </xref> oggetti da restituire.

trans-unit.source: The transactional container for the composition.
trans-unit.target: Il contenitore transazionale per la composizione.

trans-unit.source: A collection that contains all the exports that match the specified condition.
trans-unit.target: Raccolta che contiene tutte le esportazioni che soddisfano la condizione specificata.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ExportProvider.ExportsChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Genera il <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ExportProvider.ExportsChanged"> </xref> evento.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ExportsChangeEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ExportsChangeEventArgs"> </xref> che contiene i dati dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ExportProvider.ExportsChanging"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Genera il <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ExportProvider.ExportsChanging"> </xref> evento.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ExportsChangeEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.ExportsChangeEventArgs"> </xref> che contiene i dati dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets all the exports that match the conditions of the specified import.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene tutte le esportazioni che corrispondono alle condizioni di importazione specificata.

trans-unit.source: The object that defines the conditions of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref> objects to get.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto che definisce le condizioni del <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"> </xref> oggetti da ottenere.

trans-unit.source: The transactional container for the composition.
trans-unit.target: Il contenitore transazionale per la composizione.

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains a collection of <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref> objects that match the conditions defined by <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition"></xref>, if found; otherwise, an empty <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> object.
trans-unit.target: Quando questo metodo viene restituito, contiene una raccolta di <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"> </xref> gli oggetti che corrispondono alle condizioni definite dal <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition"> </xref>, se presente; in caso contrario, un oggetto vuoto <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> oggetto.

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: Questo parametro viene passato non inizializzato.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition.Cardinality*> is <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportCardinality"></xref> or <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportCardinality"></xref> and there are zero <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref> objects that match the conditions of the specified <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition"></xref>; <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition.Cardinality*> is <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportCardinality"></xref> or <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportCardinality"></xref> and there is exactly one <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref> that matches the conditions of the specified <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se <> </> *> Ã¨ <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportCardinality"> </xref> o <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportCardinality"> </xref> e ci sono zero <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"> </xref> gli oggetti che soddisfano le condizioni dell'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition"> </xref>; <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> se <> </> *> Ã¨ <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportCardinality"> </xref> o <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportCardinality"> </xref> ed Ã¨ presente esattamente un <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"> </xref> che soddisfi le condizioni dell'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition"> </xref>; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
